This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Cmd+Shift+Enter*. 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(viridis)
```


```{r}
df <- read_csv('winequality-red.csv')
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, mapping = aes( y = `alcohol`, x = `volatile acidity`, color = quality)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_discrete(name = 'Quality') +
  scale_color_viridis() +
  theme_minimal()

```

simple linear regression
```{r}
model <- lm(df$quality ~ df$alcohol + df$`density` + df$alcohol * df$`density` )
summary(model)

```


```{r}
library(glmnet)
y <- df$quality
x <- data.matrix(df[, c('alcohol','density','volatile acidity', 'pH')])

model <- glmnet(x, y, alpha = 0)
summary(model)

```
